item.title: Report X-2023110705
item.description:
Report X-2023110705

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-08T18:13:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-01
  • City: NORTH PLATTE
  • State: NE
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Cap on one bottle became loose and leaked out into the shipping box. Box was discovered leaking 11/1/23 0900 and moved aside from unload area. Box was on a trailer that had rolled on its side DescribePack: Cap on bottle became loose during transit and leaked out DurationRel: 10 and MitigateEffect: Shipping box was placed in a hazmat tote
